Articles.Content:
So, um, any progress/anything new?

Thanks! I've got somewhat busy recently, but yeah, I'm thinking on releasing soon a version with only Soviet part of configs. And for some reason I can't "disable" some of the parts, but I don't think it is a big problem.

That contract system looks pretty cool!

Thanks! I need to finish it until May, when I'll have lot of RL problems (thesis, exams...)

EDIT: Current state of config:

Edited April 6, 2015 by Niemand303

How do non-mentioned mods fare in the tech tree? Does RLA Stockalike work with this pack?

EDIT: which packs are needed from SXT? SpaceY takes care of Saturn V parts and TantaresLV takes care of N1 rocket, right?

Edited April 6, 2015 by GregroxMun

How do non-mentioned mods fare in the tech tree? Does RLA Stockalike work with this pack?

EDIT: which packs are needed from SXT? SpaceY takes care of Saturn V parts and TantaresLV takes care of N1 rocket, right?

I plan on releasing the minimally required mod support and only then move to support other mods.

Well, SXT support was planned at the time when there were no N-1 in Tantares and all the parts including N-1 have their own place. SXT roles are: Saturn V as well as IB (SpaceY 5m parts are later in game), Apollo service module, LEM, Skylab and lots of airplane parts. Only like 10 or so parts aren't present in RtK tech tree.

I have played through the Soviet side and I am halfway through the 'Murican side. Seems quite good. Usually in the middle of tech trees I tend to stall. In situations like this I tend to make a horrible rocket! I thought 'Nah, I better not do that'. Well, I did. Ever wanted to see 5 Proton rockets strapped together? No? Well I got to. Try 5 N-1's to get a base to Laythe in one launch. 'Tis fun! Thanks for the compilation and the tech tree. Well done, keep up the good work!

Thanks! Now we're going for the release!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115671
Looks a great mod. Congrats on the release!
Niemand, could you add support for my mod, Bacon Labs? It has a Vega, Ariane 5, Ariane 6, Apollo, and Little Joe II. We also plan to have a Skylab and Saturn parts.
wil you update the mod or if how is it going ?

wil you update the mod or if how is it going ?

Yep, I am planning to update it as soon as the hotfixes avalanche will end, because otherwise I might encounter some very nasty bugs.

nice thanks for the update
Will this tech tree be released before 1.0.3 or will we just wait?
